name: Different Algorithms - Concurrent File Walking vs Diff Parsing
description: Completely different problem domains: concurrent systems programming vs text parsing

snippets.description: Concurrent directory traversal using worker pool pattern with channels, goroutines, and WaitGroup
Sequential parsing of unified diff format with gitdiff library, handling file paths and operations

notes: Completely different domains: One is concurrent systems programming with Go primitives (channels, mutexes, goroutines), the other is sequential text parsing dealing with diff format conventions. No semantic overlap.
